name: Heroes and Villains
description:
Heroes and Villains

Youtube DevLog:

How To Play                Input: Mouse And Keyboard

Use WASD to navigate Overworld, Mouse For Button Clicks. On game start up, click start game to begin new session. you can explore the over world and walk into tall grass to begin battles, From there you can attempt to win the battle against a worthy opponent. Enjoy!

Credits

Brian Viveiros STU#101209942 Contribution - Enemy Ai, Ability System, Title Screen, Player Character, User Interface, Saving/Loading

Emmanuel Nofuente-LoBlack STU#101126071 Contribution - Encounter System, Tilemap, Game Music, Game over Scene, Player Character, Level Design
